# The `MCTargetExpr` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is an extension point for target-specific <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> subclasses to implement. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCTargetExpr</CodeBlock>

</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This is an extension point for target-specific <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> subclasses to implement.

NOTE: All subclasses are required to have trivial destructors because MCExprs are bump pointer allocated and not destructed.

Definition at line 657 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcexpr-h">MCExpr.h</a>.
